actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-925.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 11180) to increase the public debt limit through March 1, 1979, to provide that thereafter the public debt limit shall be established pursuant to the congressional budget procedures and to improve debt management.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 11180 (Public debt limit).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 11180) to increase the public debt limit through March 1, 1979, to provide that thereafter the public debt limit shall be established pursuant to the congressional budget procedures and to improve debt management.
